scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prod && WinSCP.com /command "open vps/proxy/webmaster-jan" "synchronize remote D:/Dev/websites/jan/2018/public /staging.jan-sl.de -delete" "exit"
scripts.deploy:production: npm run prod && WinSCP.com /command "open vps/proxy/jan" "synchronize remote D:/Dev/websites/jan/2018/public /var/www/html/jan-sl.de -delete" "exit"
